column1: Table 8. Montenegro: Consolidated General Government Fiscal Operations, 2014-2024 1/
Taxes on turnover of real estate           0.4     0.4     0.3     0.4      0.4      0.4     0.4     0.4    0.4      0.4     0.4
Sources: Ministry of Finance; and Fund staff estimates and projections.
1/ Includes central government and local governments.
2/ According to GFSM 1986, payments of loan guarantees or related to court rulings are recorded as government expenses.
3/ To reflect pre-payments made for construction of Bar-Boljare highway that exceed the pace of actual capital expenditure.
4/ Historical discrepancy is the difference between reported financing and that derived from monetary and debt data.
